name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX: Tag Force 3
name_original: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX: Tag Force 3
description: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Tag Force 3 utilizes characters from the third and fourth series of the show, with players charged with assembling the ultimate card deck by defeating their peers in thrilling duels. Over 3500 cards can be collected and used, and players can also partner with a dueling partner to embark on graduation tag duels against rival pairs.
